name: The Story of Canada's Last DC-10s
description:
The McDonnell-Douglas DC-10 is an iconic aircraft that's sadly being retired all around the world over the past few decades.

However, did you know that some Canadian DC-10s actually flew up until 2018? This is the story of Canada's last DC-10s!
